isValid.description: Indicates if the user is confirmed as valid. Should be set only if 100% sure.

suspiciousActivity.description: Indicates if suspicious activity is detected. Set to true only if certain.

status.description: Action to take based on user evaluation.

welcomeMessage.description: Welcome message to the user, provided only if status is 'welcome'. It can be null or empty.

unapproveReason.description: Reason for unapproving the user, if applicable.
